summary: An adventurous coming-of-age story that follows young rebellious Sherry through Europe as she loses her illusions, virginity and lip ring.
cast: Elliot Page|Natasha Wightman|August Diehl|Beatrice Brown|Maxwell McCabe-Lokos|Elliot McCabe Lokos|Diana Greenwood|Eric Thal|Jefferson Guzman|Willy Rachow|Christian Näthe|Jim Sturgess|Patrícia Guerreiro|Joaquim Horta|Armin Dillenberger|Rui M. Silva|André Teodósio|Alberto Magassela|Márcia Cardoso|Ilidio Frances|Andresa Soares|Teresa Madruga|Antonio Pedro Faria|Cristina Do Aido|Teresa Mónica|Paula Garcia|Zoé Anna Weiland
title: Mouth to Mouth
